all_text_content:
Verse of the Day
For Sarah conceived, and bare Abraham a son in his old age, at the set time of which God had spoken to him.
Genesis 21:2
Quote of the Day
"Many people of modest means are joining the Church and transforming their lives."
Elder Carlos A. Godoy | 1 Oct 2025General Conference
